details:
emesene tries to be a simple but feature complete program that allows one to
 chat using MSN and Jabber based networks.

 From it's roots emesene 2 provides a UI that is easy to use by users coming
 from Windows Live Messenger but doing special focus on consistency and
 simplicity.
 protocol::msn-messenger, role::program, scope::application,
 uitoolkit::gtk, use::chatting, works-with::im, x11::application
